item.description:
I have the ability to get a lot of Bollywood movies to watch and was thinking about doing a semi-regular potluck at my house.

Dinner and a movie. I'll try and pick a light movie for the first night. Then we can talk about the next night's theme. This is assuming that this is a hit and there will be a next night!

Let me know your thoughts!

I'm going to take away the maybe option to leave it open for only those who KNOW they can come! Please don't RSVP yes if you are a maybe!

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: Bollywood Potluck
